products.title: Aguas Linen Splash Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
With a pattern resembling a watercolour landscape rendered in dark and blue hues, this beautiful roman blind is thoroughly modern-looking and artistic.
  
The presence of darker tones masks the blue enough that the effect is neutral and easy to match, but strong and bold enough
